title: Lf duo buddy to climb with, I'm not trash.
body:
* **IGN: AustraliasFinest**
---------------------------------------------------
Even though I'm capable of playing really well, things seem to go wrong for me at almost every turn in ranked. I'm looking to prove to myself that I'm better than bronze/silver. I work really well in a duo, so I'm looking for someone to play with. 
Last season I was silver 4, this season I was put in bronze, and I'm determined to get out.

I main **BOT & MID**, I have a big champ pool that I'm comfortable with. 
Happy to play **ADC** or **support**!
---------
(Discord is preferred for voice chat.)

replies.body: isn't this exactly what trash players would say?

> [{quoted}](name=Modulus,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=lVVAZEwG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-09T05:30:36.333+0000)
>
> isn't this exactly what trash players would say?

Sure, but I realise my greater potential and I've committed myself to it.
For some reason, this season's bronze players feels worse than last seasons. Can't even get out of B5 at the moment thanks to people feeding. Good luck with your climb!
In a similar situation to you, add me in game, my username is PatrickArrow, keen to play.
